name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Chinese who went to Russia to join the army wrote in his diary: "Today I got the news that the United States will no longer provide military assistance to Ukraine. The United States's no longer supporting will bring this war to an end in 2025. The Ukrainian Nazi fascists will eventually die in the beautiful dream that capitalism has created for them." He also revealed in his diary that as the weather gets colder, it becomes more and more difficult to supply materials.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The uncle of the student who fell from the building accused the relevant departments of not letting the parents know the truth.
In another live broadcast room, viewers in the comment area called on the people of Shaanxi to unite and make a big deal out of the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A large number of people gathered in front of the school to seek justice for the student who fell from the building. The slogan at the school gate read "Develop vocational education, I support you - Xi Jinping"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the platform is gradually deleting videos of Pucheng Vocational School residents defending their rights and seeking justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/Fv4a98c0iH

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This video is reproduced from station b

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 2, a store in Guangzhou issued 101 first prizes for the Double Color Ball.
Some netizens discovered that the 101 first prizes of the lottery store were divided into three tickets, two 50 single-number tickets, and one 6+16 compound ticket.
It was rumored that these two 50 tickets were bought by one person, and the boss thought he was going for the second prize (all 6 red balls of the Double Color Ball, but the last blue ball was not hit, it is the second prize), so he bought the same first 6 digits, and the 7th digit included all blue balls. This way, he can definitely win the first prize.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 4, the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television issued a notice on the implementation of the "Micro-Short Drama +" action plan to empower thousands of industries:
In 25 years, the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television will thoroughly organize and implement micro-short drama creation plans including travel, learning law, brand building, learning classics, popular science and watching intangible cultural heritage. In the subdivided fields, a total of 300 key micro-short dramas with leading roles and innovative value will be launched to create a batch of high-quality micro-short dramas with profound thoughts and exquisite art
Comment netizens are mostly not optimistic

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: To boost the economy, we should not only focus on cities, but also tap the potential of rural areas. If rural housing land enters the market, the annual market value will reach 1.3 trillion yuan, according to conservative estimates. -- Lian Ping, Chairman of the China Chief Economists Forum, at the 2025 China Chief Economists Forum Annual Meeting in Shanghai on January 4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a kindergarten in Xuzhou, Jiangsu was exposed for washing dishes in the toilet for a long time.
Education Bureau: The problem was verified by monitoring and the kindergarten has been ordered to rectify.
Parents are not satisfied with this handling result: they only asked the kindergarten to rectify, but did not set a rectification period, nor did they rectify and investigate the kindergarten according to relevant regulations. At the same time, the school did not make any explanation or apology, which further aggravated the anger and worries of parents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Public Resources Trading Network of Nanchong City, Sichuan Province, issued a notice of bid failure. Due to the difference of 1 cent in the bidding control price in different documents, the review of the 10 million yuan project of Tianchang Street Community Comprehensive Service Center in Yingshan County was terminated.
Restarting the bidding process may cost much more than 1 cent.
The announcement shows that the owner of the project is Chengnan Street Office of Yingshan County People's Government, and the bidding agency is Guang'an Yongwangfa Engineering Management Co., Ltd. A staff member of Chengnan Street said: "We strictly follow the bidding procedures. The agency made a low-level mistake, and the bidding list was not consistent with the bidding announcement."
A staff member of the bidding agency involved said frankly: "The reason for the failure of this bid is that the figures of the bidding control price in different documents differ by 1 cent, which may be caused by work errors. We have started to re-bid, and please pay attention to the latest information released on the official website in the future."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, due to a series of earthquakes in Yinchuan, Ningxia, some parents hoped that the school would be closed to ensure the safety of their children, and called on other parents to call the Education Bureau to pressure the school to suspend classes.
This behavior was criticized by other parents, who said that these parents' behavior was incitement. It is suspected that some of the parents who made suggestions were from other places, which was also criticized by Yinchuan parents in the group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution On the evening of January 5, a large number of people spontaneously gathered in front of Pucheng Vocational School to support the students who fell to their death. During this period, the police carried out violent arrests. The parents of the students who fell to their death were placed under house arrest in a hotel by the vocational school during this period, and the school teachers stood at the door of the room to monitor them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 5, a wildfire broke out near the Shiniu Reservoir in Gangbei District, Guigang City, Guangxi, very close to the city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens filmed what they suspected to be several security guards of Pucheng Vocational College dragging a person into the school and beating him. It was reported online that the person being beaten was the uncle of the student who fell from the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Cases from the first episode of the documentary "Anti-Corruption for the People" by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection:
1. Audacious! Corrupt officials posted their personal payment codes in the service hall
2. They embezzled 230,000 yuan from campus meals at a dime
3. Self-deception! Corrupt officials returned one or two bundles every time they collected money, and said they couldn't give so much money while collecting money
Zhou Xiaojian, the former director of the Housing Maintenance Fund Service Office of Dong'an County, Yongzhou City, Hunan Province, was in huge debt due to speculation and had the idea of embezzling funds. He customized fake receipts to deceive the public, and even printed out his personal payment QR code while on duty and placed it at the payment window of the government service hall. Zhou Xiaojian embezzled a total of more than 9.93 million yuan in special housing maintenance funds, misappropriated more than 1.72 million yuan, and issued more than 3,000 fake tickets.

Qi Shiguo, the former logistics director of the Seventh Primary School in Qikai District, Changchun City, Jilin Province, reached an agreement with the Jilin Golf Catering Management Company, which was responsible for catering, to give the then school principal 8 yuan per meal from the meal fee of each student...
fullContent:
中央纪监委《反腐为了人民》纪录片第一集案例：
1.胆大妄为！贪官把个人收款码贴在办事大厅
2.从校园餐里1毛钱1毛钱贪了23万
3.自欺欺人！贪官每次收钱都退回一两捆，贪官一边收钱一边说不能给这么多
湖南永州市东安县房屋维修资金服务办公室原主任周小健，因投机行为背上巨额债务，打起了挪用资金的主意。他定做假收据蒙骗群众，甚至在值班时直接把个人收款二维码打印出来，放在政府办事大厅缴费窗口。周小健共计贪污房屋专项维修资金993万余元、挪用172万余元，开出假票3000多张。

吉林省长春市汽开区第七小学原后勤主任戚世国，与负责配餐的吉林高尔夫餐饮管理公司达成约定，从学生每人每餐8块钱餐费里，给时任校长、后勤主任两人各1毛钱回扣。后来校园餐费涨到每人每餐12元，回扣也增加到了每人每餐3毛钱。从2010年8月至2019年12月，9年多时间里，高尔夫餐饮管理公司从学生餐费里克扣了70余万元用于单位行贿，其中戚世国一人就收受23万余元。

四川射洪市农业农村局原党组书记张朝平，把高标准农田项目拿来和商人老板做交易，收受贿赂400余万元。2017年，建筑商人罗江认识了张朝平，时常邀请张朝平吃吃喝喝，主动为其各种应酬买单。张朝平随后就向下属推荐了罗江，导致高标准农田项目从招投标到施工、验收的各个监管环节都流于形式。
每次收罗江的钱时，张朝平都要拿出一两捆来还给罗江，口头上要求他不能克扣工程质量，用这种掩耳盗铃的做法，作为收钱时心理上的遮羞布。“我有时跟他说不能给那么多，工程质量这个肯定是大计。”
事实上，村里水渠断裂、土地不平、机械下不了田，即便是自己家乡的土地受害，张朝平也因吃人嘴短拿人手软，不敢面对问题。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 5, the Maoming Marathon site was hung with advertising banners for having three children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 24, a third-grade student from Lingshan Town Primary School in Haikou City died in school after school for no reason. He had multiple fractures and a dislocated arm. The school refused to allow the parents to view the surveillance camera because the surveillance camera was damaged.
The parents held up a sign to seek information from those who knew about the incident and clear their son's name.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 6, Pucheng, Shaanxi. People continued to take to the streets and go to school to speak out for the child who fell from the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Korean couple was beaten by Chinese people just because they dissuaded them from smoking indoors. According to Korean media reports, six Chinese people at Dalin Chinese Restaurant were eating and smoking at a barbecue restaurant in Seoul. A Korean couple couldn't stand it and asked them to smoke outside. Unexpectedly, one of them said, "What's so great about Koreans? Can't they even smoke?" and then they beat the couple together.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, Xinzhou residents posted online that they had been without water since January 2. Due to high-speed rail construction, Xinzhou City originally planned to renovate the water supply trunk line from January 2 to 6:00 on January 4, and the water supply would be cut off for two days. However, the water supply has not been restored until the 6th, and some residents have been without water for 6 days. The water supply restoration time has been changed repeatedly in multiple announcements.
Some netizens joked that the water supply company is spreading rumors

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some local residents complained: Xinzhou residents have been without water for several days. This is a major accident concerning the water supply for the entire city, but there are only three workers working at the repair site.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, a search found that the official website of Nezha Automobile could no longer be accessed normally. The page after opening it showed "System maintenance, please try again later". 
Previously, in November 2024, Nezha Automobile was exposed to large-scale layoffs and factory shutdowns; on December 6, Nezha Automobile announced that due to company strategy, Zhang Yong would no longer serve as CEO and would become a company consultant. Founder and Chairman Fang Yunzhou would serve as CEO concurrently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens reported that the live broadcast rooms in Pucheng are blocked one by one, and the live broadcast was blocked at the end of the video. Netizens reported that in the live broadcast rooms opened by local people in Pucheng, regardless of whether they were related to the student death incident, netizens asked about the situation outside the school in the comment area, resulting in many live broadcast rooms being blocked, and the anchors had to convey their opinions to the audience in an obscure way.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The headquarters of Xi'an Greenland Group was occupied by migrant workers demanding their wages. The migrant workers slept on the floor of Greenland Group for many days to demand their wages. Behind them were posters welcoming the New Year.
It is worth noting that Greenland Group is a state-owned enterprise.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a blogger compared the past and present Spring Festival Galas, and complained that the present Spring Festival Gala was all about making dumplings and forced sentimentality, which was awkward from beginning to end. In contrast, the past Spring Festival Gala was all about humor and satire on the current social situation.
The video was deleted by the platform after receiving 122,000 likes, but netizens who had already recorded the video forwarded it one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 6, at the gate of Pucheng Vocational Education Center, ordinary people who went to the school to support the student who fell to his death for no reason broke through the police wall and entered the school.
The video shows that during the attack, several men were arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 6, at Pucheng Vocational Education Center, people who showed their support for the student who fell to his death for no reason were not afraid of the police and security guards. They worked together to push open the school gate and open a path for the people behind to enter the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video Supplement

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Pucheng, Shaanxi reported a vocational school student falling from a building: before the incident, he had a verbal argument and physical conflict with a first-year student from the same school; the public security authorities determined that the student died from falling from a high altitude, and a criminal case has been ruled out for now.
